project_descr: This project will enable Federated states of Micronesia (FSM) to prepare its Second National Communication (SNC) to the Conference of the Parties of the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).

outputs.output_descr: This project will enable the Federated states of Micronesia (FSM) to prepare its Second National Communication (SNC) to the Conference of the Parties of the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).
